author: BBC News
title: Court bid to prevent BBC airing MI5 agent probe
description: The government wants to stop a programme which alleges the man is a dangerous extremist and misogynist.
content:
The government wants to stop a BBC programme that alleges an MI5 agent is a dangerous extremist and misogynist, who abused two former female partners.
